column4: how can i connect a linux/ubuntu machine to a network so that on login your roaming profile is used?
for that matter, how can i set it up to login to the network?
which network are you trying to connect to? SMB? Ldap? Kerberos? Remote Pam?
not quite sure... it's a windows server, set up so that the windows computers can be logged into from any of the clients, and settings & files are broaght along with them
